item.title: Live from the Library
item.description: In which we record live from the Library of Congress; time travel complicates everything; X-Men is a fundamentally queer narrative; we attempt to summarize a lot of history very fast; and when identities are politicized, claiming them becomes a political act. Feed: https://www.xplainthexmen.com/feed/podcast/

item.title: DZ-119: Final Character Choices & Great Endings

In this episode, Stu and Chas focus solely on the final choices made by protagonists and how that reflects their character journey and successfully, or not,... Feed: https://draftzero.libsyn.com/rss
